documentation.text:
@title determines owner of deployed contract
@dev This contract initialises the deploying address as the owner of this contract.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the owner of this contract can call this function."

arguments.value: Only the owner of this contract can call this function.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the owner of this contract can call this function."

documentation.text: @dev Access control Modifier

@notice restricts access to parts of the game to non-registered players.
@dev to ensure only registered players can access specific functions

@notice stops deposits if active.
@dev checks to see if deposit circuit breaker is enabled, in which case the deposit function will not execute.

@notice stops withdrawals if active.
@dev checks to see if withdrawals circuit break is enabled, in which case the withdrawBalance/withdrawAll functions will not execute.

@notice disables/enables deposits.
@dev circuit breaker to disable the deposit function. Can only be accessed by contract owner.

@notice disables/enables deposits.
@dev circuit breaker to disable the deposit function. Can only be accessed by contract owner.

devdoc.details: This contract can destroy all extended contracts.onlyOwner modifier restricts access to owner declared in Owned.

destroy().details: restricted to contract owner.all funds deposited to contract will be returned to owner should this be called.plans to implement a countdown to give players time to withdraw funds before contract destruction.

devdoc.title: Determines mortality of

destroy().notice: destroys and removes contracts from blockchain.
